Subcommittee on International Operations and Human Rights

official_title: To provide for grants to establish the Bill Emerson and Mickey Leland memorial fellowship programs.

summary.text: Congressional Hunger Fellows Act of 2000 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to award a grant to the Congressional Hunger Center to enable it to establish Bill Emerson and Mickey Leland Hunger Fellowships to address hunger and other humanitarian needs in the United States and internationally, respectively. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To provide for grants to establish the Bill Emerson and Mickey Leland memorial fellowship programs.
